message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $90. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
I'm not sure I can go down to $105, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $112?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to go down to $108?
I'm getting a bit tired of negotiating, but I'm willing to make one more move. How about we meet at $115?
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm not comfortable going above $110. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?
